mdRecord.dcterms:description: This invitation is for the opening of an exhibit with lecture and reception. The front of the invitation features a grouping of faces from various portraits with the caption, "Who's Who . . ." The invitation is from the Department of Fine Arts at Washington and Lee University and the Rockbridge County Historical Society. Guest curator and lecturer was Winifred Hadsel. The date of the event was April 29, 1985.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Who's Who . . . A Lexcture and Reception, April 29, 1985
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Street names
Hadsel, Winifred, 1917-
